Stem: Cylindrical, fleshy, many branching, dark green to greyish-green, with woolly hairs and spines at points (areoles).
Flowers: Brownish or greenish-pink with reddish or brownish edges. 3-4 cm diameter.
FruitSeeds: Green to yellow oval-shaped with deep depression at top. 1-5 cm long. Sometimes with a few spines.
DistinguishingFeatures: Combination of features distinguish from other cacti. May be hard to distinguish from other *Cylindropuntia* species.
